duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the team by collecting data related to product development, pricing, reserving, and financial reporting.
Analyze experience reports and manual rate analyses to develop recommendations for improvements.
Participate in a variety of professional development and networking opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a degree related to the field (Actuarial Science, Mathematics, Statistics, etc.) with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA being desired. Graduation between Dec 2024 and May 2026.
